summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackGently cleanse skin with these facial cleansing towelettes. Makeup remover wipes work to dissolve all traces of dirt, oil, makeup & waterproof mascara. Packaging may vary.
details: DetailsBenefitsActual packaging may varyPre-moistened Neutrogena Makeup Remover Face Wipes to gently cleanseRemove makeup and effectively cleanse skin in one easy step with these facial cleansing towelettesMakeup remover wipes work to dissolve all traces of dirt, oil & makeup, including stubborn makeupFormulated to be gentle on the eye area, facial wet wipes are suitable for contact lens wearersDisposable face wipes thoroughly cleanse skin with no heavy residue, so there's no need to rinseNeutrogena's face cleansing wipes are also ophthalmologist, dermatologist, and allergy-testedGet superior cleansing and makeup removing power at your fingertips with an alcohol-free formulaResearch ResultsRemoves 99% of makeup even stubborn waterproof mascara with these makeup remover wipesFormulated WithoutAlcoholItem 2095841How To UseGently wipe face with towelette, removing dirt and all traces of face and eye makeup. There is no need to rinse. Dispose of the towelette in trash receptacle (do not flush). After removing towelette, reseal refill pack. If stored in vanity case, secure lid.IngredientsWater, Isononyl Isononanoate, Isostearyl Palmitate, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Hexylene Glycol, PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Phenoxyethanol, Sucrose Cocoate, Carbomer, PEG-4 Laurate, Fragrance, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzoic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Ethylhexylglycerin
how_to_use: Gently wipe face with towelette, removing dirt and all traces of face and eye makeup. There is no need to rinse. Dispose of the towelette in trash receptacle (do not flush). After removing towelette, reseal refill pack. If stored in vanity case, secure lid.

reviews.headline: Love these wipes!
reviews.comments: They make your skin feel so smooth! After a long day of being in make up all day.

reviews.headline: Great staple product
reviews.comments: I always have these on hand to remove makeup or panda eyes,  from mascara. Removes easily & stays moist, if you keep them in a large baggie for added hydration.

reviews.headline: Love the feel and look after you use same to clean or remove
reviews.comments: This does wonder once you use it as recommended

reviews.headline: Sensitive Skin? Beware!
reviews.comments: If you have sensitive skin, avoid at ALL costs! I've suffered painful reactions resulting in hives, stinging, burning, and peeling. It takes days to recover. A class action lawsuit was filed for the damage their makeup wipes have caused to others.

reviews.headline: holy grail!
reviews.comments: been using these since i started using makeup and these have never failed me. only have to use one! i've tried others & i always end uo going back to this one!

reviews.headline: does well, but...
reviews.comments: This product works well at removing makeup. I love it except it makes my nose area break out badly.

reviews.headline: Not limited edition as pictured
reviews.comments: I am disappointed as I purposely purchased this item as the picture clearly shows it should be a limited edition design. I received the "regular" designed package instead of tv e animal print package.

reviews.headline: You get what you pay for
reviews.comments: So, I bought these just spur the moment, cheap, and I was already in the store. Mistake.. they do take off the majority of make up but it might take 2 wipes. Also, leaves a very oily film on your hands and face. Definitely need to wash/rinse after use. I'm also not a fan of it burning my eyes after use! Plus, once you get in the shower, it reveals the missed make up the wipe didn't take off :/. I'll be returning tomorrow..

reviews.headline: I will buy these products again.
reviews.comments: Everything was what I wanted.

reviews.headline: Removes Cosmetics Easily
reviews.comments: These towelettes remove makeup easily. They do leave a somewhat oily remover residue so I recommend washing or rinsing face afterwards.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Removes makeup well and doesn't dry out my face

reviews.headline: Oily
reviews.comments: My face is probably clean after using this but I could never get over the oily feeling after using it. Made my face feel dirty. Will not be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: Bad quality
reviews.comments: Whenever I use the wipe on my face, it rips apart after a few wipes. It has very bad quality and I will not buy it again.

reviews.headline: Harmful ingredients
reviews.comments: Do your research on the ingredients in this product before you use it.. there are Atleast 7 different preservatives and PEG's.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: This wipe is effective, it doesn't have a strong odor abd doesn't irritate my skin. It's the only one I'll use

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I have used these All the time works great

reviews.headline: Always
reviews.comments: These will always be a favorite. I always come back to these when needed. Sometimes I feel like they have a little too much moisture and they make my face feel greasy. But just depends! I love!

reviews.headline: get it
reviews.comments: no irritation doesnt dry out fast has tons of moisture breaks down makeup with ease only issue is u gotta squeeze it with a paper towel or leave it to dry for a couple minutes if youre using it for spot correction because its packed with product which is great for taking all ur makeup off without scrubbing or dragging but will leave the oily substance on ur makeup if u use it while its saturated. if your skin is oily i recommend following with a wash with water or a gentle cleanser. if your skin is dry or normal you dont have to moisturize afterwards it leaves a moisturizing layer on your face that soaks up overnight. has never caused acne for me. i have normal skin thats a little dry in the winter.

reviews.headline: Oily and Irritating
reviews.comments:
I tried these makeup remover wipes based upon reviews and the affordable price. You get what you pay for with these - they are awful!
The formula is so oily, overly scented, and causes eye irritation. These went back for a refund.
I'm now using Honest Beauty's make up remover wipes and highly recommend those. Way better! Honest Beauty is more effective and gentle on the skin and eyes without heavy frangrances.

reviews.headline: Never go wrong
reviews.comments: I have these in my makeup just in case I mess up it's amazing

faceoff_positive.comments: Thank you to the employee that suggested these, they're my new favorite product!  I'm a bit picky when it comes to makeup wipes, I have sensitive combination skin and it can be difficult to find products that work without ruining my skin.  I love everything about these!  They're soft, the smell is delicate, and they really get the job done.  I was impressed with how much makeup they removed.  It usually only takes 1 wipe to take my makeup off, and then I wash my face afterwards to really get my pores clean.  These have been great, they don't burn my face, and don't make me break out.  Will absolutely purchase again!
faceoff_positive.headline: New Favorite!

faceoff_negative.comments: If your a skincare freak like me, you would understand that makeup wipes are not good for your skin.. Not only does it destroy your skin barrier. This also contains chemicals such as phthalates, triclosan, and parabens, which are known to be endocrine disruptors, plus other ingredients like fragrances that can irritate the skin. In addition to being harmful to your own personal health. If you are looking for something to take off your makeup at the end of the day, opt for Banila Co's Clean it Zero cleansing balm. I promise you, oil cleansing is just a step up from make up wipes. You'll love the sherbet texture of a cleansing balm.
faceoff_negative.headline: Please don't ...
